sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCard, MDBCardText, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardHeader, MDBBtn, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBIcon, MDBModal, MDBModalDialog, MDBModalContent, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalBody, MDBModalTitle, MDBModalFooter, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownItem, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBTable, MDBTableHead, MDBTableBody, MDBNavbar, MDBRadio } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; function App() { type Info = { id: string, full_name: string, email: string, phone: string, mobile: string, address: string }; type Privs = { role: string, edit_priv: string, edit: string, copy: string, view: string }; {/* HGETALL user:1 1) "id" 2) "@admin" 3) "name" 4) "Admin" 5) "role" 6) "2" HGETALL user_info:1 1) "id" 2) "@admin" 3) "full_name" 4) "Artjom" 5) "email" 6) "sda20036@gmail.com" 7) "phone" 8) "89171846394" 9) "mobile" 10) "-" 11) "address" 12) "Tatischeva" get num_users "3" HGETALL role_priv:1 1) "role" 2) "2" 3) "edit_priv" 4) "1" 5) "edit" 6) "1" 7) "copy" 8) "1" 9) "view" 10) "1" */} const [roleSettingsModal, setRoleSettingsModal] = useState(false); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [userRole, setUserRole] = useState(2); const [userId, setUserId] = useState("@admin"); const [userName, setUserName] = useState("Admin"); const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState(); const [userToView, setUserToView] = useState("@admin"); const [userPrivInfo, setUserPrivInfo] = useState(); const toggleOpenSettings = () => setRoleSettingsModal(!roleSettingsModal); const handleGetAnotherUserInfo = (id: string) => { if(userPrivInfo?.view != "0") { // Retrieving another user info setUserToView(id); let count = 1; users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { if(user.id == id) { fetch(`http://localhost:5000/get_user_info?id=${count}`).then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUserInfo(data) console.log(data) } ); } count++; }) console.log("\nyou are viewing ", id); } else { alert("Not enough privilliges!"); } } const handleSwitchRole = (id : string) => { setUserId(id); let count = 1; users.map((user : {id: string, name: string, role: number}) => { if(user.id == id) { setUserRole(user.role); setUserName(user.name); console.log("found user", user) // Get user info fetch(`http://localhost:5000/get_user_info?id=${count}`).then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUserInfo(data) console.log(data) } ) // Get user privilleges fetch(`http://localhost:5000/get_role_priv?role=${user.role}`).then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUserPrivInfo(data) console.log(data) } ) } count++; }) console.log("\nyou are now ", id); } useEffect(() => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/get_users").then( res => res.json() ).then( data => { setUsers(data) console.log(data) } ); }, []) return (
{/* Modal with settings */} –†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞ User Edit Copy Read Admin üóë Moderator üóë User üóë Save changes {/* Navigation bar */} –Æ–∑–µ—Ä { users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { return handleSwitchRole(user.id as string)}> {user.name} }) } {/* –ê–¥–º–∏–Ω –ú–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∞—Ç–æ—Ä –ü–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å */} toggleOpenSettings()}>–ò–∑–º–µ–Ω–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∞ –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞ {/* Main content */} {/* Card for profile avatar and actions */}

{userName}

{userId}

 {/* Card with imoprtant selected info */} –ò–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ { users.map((user : {id: string, name: string}) => { return handleGetAnotherUserInfo(user.id as string)}> {user.name} }) } Full Name { e.preventDefault(); return false; }}>{userInfo?.full_name}
Email {userInfo?.email}
Phone {userInfo?.phone}
Mobile {userInfo?.mobile}
Address {userInfo?.address} {/* Card for choosing object in list for viewving info */} –¢–≤–æ–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∏–ª–µ–≥–∏–∏ –†–µ–¥–∞–∫—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ
–ß—Ç–µ–Ω–∏–µ
); } export default App;
